import React, {useRef} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' function CreateArticle() { const navigate = useNavigate() const title = useRef("") const content = useRef("") const addArticle = (e) => { e.preventDefault() let artcile = { title: title.current.value, content: content.current.value, } axios.post("http://localhost:4000/articles",artcile) .then(Response => { title.current.value = "" content.current.value = "" navigate("/articles") }) .catch(error => console.log(error)) } return (
Login

) } export default CreateArticle
